name: Welcome to Droid Towers!
description:
To start building your Tower,
tap the Build menu in the bottom right.

name: Breaking ground
description:
Click on the house icon to open the buy menu.

Then click "BUY" next to the Lobby.

name: Pillars of Success
description:
Your cursor now is in "Placement" mode.

Tap to place the Lobby.

name: There is no place like Home
description:
The Lobby serves as the base for a Tower.

Droids need a place to call home.

You should buy an Apartment for them.

name: Beam me up, Scotty
description:
Notice the little red box on your Apartment?

That means it is not connected to the Main Lobby.

Lets build an Elevator so the Droids can move in.

name: Sky's the limit!
description:
Elevators need to service each floor of your Tower.

Connect your elevator by dragging the top or bottom
of the elevator shaft.

name: Navigation
description:
Now that your Tower is up and running,
lets learn how to control your camera.

To move the screen around, tap anywhere and drag.

name: Magnification
description:
Great!

You can also zoom in via your mouse's scroll wheel.

It works just like scrolling a document.

Try it now.

name: Population Overlays
description:
Now that you've mastered the camera controls,
it is time to introduce the data overlays.

In the top right corner click the Overlay button, it has two squares in a circle.

name: Population Overlays
description:
Look at the Apartment you built, notice the blue coloring?

This signifies that there are Droids living there.

Other overlays can provide you insight into the management
of your Tower's overall success.

Now turn off the Population overlay by clicking 'Clear All'

name: Congratulations!
description:
Congratulations!

You are now ready to conquer the sky's!
